short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your prayers and then sync them to your Prayers account remotely or offline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All in a friendly and very practical way to use, while you are working, when you ask to pray for someone, when you feel like you have to pray for something.

We believe that it can be a tool that can bring communion with God and blessing to your life. We recognize that no virtual medium can substitute for personal communion with God and we wish to honor the traditional means of living together with our brothers and sisters and with our Lord.
